text: Ara yara imana eneche tadera sathe yakhana tara molakata kare takhana bale -- “amara imana enechi.” Ara yakhana tadera lokera eke an'yera sathe niribili haya takhana bale -- “allah tomadera kache ya prakasa karechena ta ki tomara odera janiye diccha, yate ora e-sabera sahayye tomadera prabhura samane tomadera sathe bitarka kare? Tomara ki tabe bujhate paracha na?”
